Amagaju FC vs Rayon Sports

Amagaju FC 1-2 Rayon Sports

Uko umukino uri kugenda

Umwanditsi

: Eric Tony Ukurikiyimfura

Amafoto

: Ntare Julius

17:24

Rayon Sports isubiye ku mwanya wa mbere

Rayon Sports yongeye gufata umwanya wa mbere nyuma yo gutsinda ibitego 2-1. Gikundiro iyoboye shampiyona n'amanota 63 mu gihe APR FC ya kabiri ifite amanota 62.

17:22

Amagaju asubiye mu cyiciro cya kabiri

Gutsindwa uyu mukino bitumye ikipe y'Amagaju FC isubira mu cyiciro cya kabiri kuko ubu iifte amanota 17 ku mwanya wa nyuma mu gihe Gicumbi FC ifite amanota 27 ku mwanya wa 14 mu gihe hasigaye imikino itatu y'amanota icyenda.

17:18

Umukino urarangiye: Rayon Sports itahanye amanota y'umunsi

Rayon Sports itsinze umukino waberaga i Nyamagabe ku bitego 2-1.

17:17

90+3' Umukino uhagaze gato

Umunyezamu wa Rayon Sports, Mazimpaka Andre ahisemo kuryama hasi mu kibuga kugira ngo iminota ibe igabanyuka. Umusifuzi ahamagaje abaganga ngo barebe ko hari icyo yabaye

17:12

90' Iminota y'inyongera

Umusifuzi yerekanye iminota ine y'inyongera

17:09

86' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Irambona Eric arenguye umupira mu izamu urenga umunyezamu Pacifique usanga abakinnyi barimo Mudeyi Suleiman uhise atsinda igitego cya kabiri. Abakinnyi b'Amagaju FC bagiye kuburana ku basifuzi ariko ntacyo bitanze.

17:05

84' Umukino ubaye uhagaze

Umunyezamu w'Amagaju FC, Twagirimana Pacifique, aryamye hasi. Mukanya gato hari umupira akubise ibipfunsi, uragaruka bimusaba kujya kugundagurana n'abandi bakinnyi. Birashoboka ko ariho yagiriye ikibazo

17:01

75' Rayon Sports ihushije igitego

Raphael Da Silva na Ulimwengu bananiwe kubyaza umusaruro uburyo babonye imbere y'izamu umupira ufatwa na Twagirimana Pacifique.

16:56

70' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Habimana Hussein wakinaga mu mutima wa ba myugariro asimbuwe na Mudeyi Suleiman ukina mu kibuga hagati ku ruhande.

16:52

66' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Rayon Sports ibonye umupira w'umuterekano utewe na Manzi Thierry ukora ku rukuta rw'abakinnyi ujya muri koruneri itewe na Mugisha Gilbert, Amagaju arenza umupira.

16:49

62' Umukino wabaye uhagaze gato

Umukinnyi w'Amagaju FC (Aku Emmanuel) wari ku ngobyi arahanutse mu gihe yari ateruwe n'abakoranabushake ndetse yahawe ikarita y'umuhondo

16:43

57' Paccy arokoye Amagaju FC

Rayon Sports ihushije igitego ku buryo bubiri bwabazwe, imipira yombi ikurwamo n'umunyezamu Twagirimana Pacifique ukuyemo umupira ukomeye wa Mugheni Fabrice, awushyira muri koruneri.

16:40

54' Rayon Sports iri gusatira bikomeye

Mutsinzi Ange ateye umupira w'umuterekano ujya hanze. Rayon Sports yokeje Amagaju igitutu muri iyi minota ibanza y'igice cya kabiri.

16:35

49' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Mugisha Gilbert yinjiye mu kibuga mu mwanya wa Manishimwe Djabel

16:31

46' Igitego cy'Amagaju FC

Uko Emmanuel yishyuriye Amagaju FC igice cya kabiri kigitangira. Abakinnyi ba Rayon Sports n'abandi bantu benshi kuri iki kibuga ntibamenye n'ibibaye kuko ari bwo umusifuzi yari agitangiza iki gice cya kabiri.

16:30

Igice cya kabiri kiratangiye

16:28

Mu yindi mikino

Igice cya mbere ku bindi bibuga

Musanze FC 1-0 Sunrise FC
Kiyovu Sports 1-0 Espoir FC
Bugesera FC 0-2 Police FC

16:16

Igice cya mbere kirarangiye

16:15

45' Umunota w'inyongera

Umusifuzi wa kane w'umukino, Mukansanga Salima, yerekanye umunota umwe w'inyongera.

Ikipe y'Amagaju FC igerageje ishoti rya kure ritewe na Irambona Fabrice umupira uca hejuru y'izamu.

16:10

39' Rayon Sports iri guhuza cyane

Kwinjira mu kibuga kwa Donkor Prosper biragaragara ko hari byinshi byahinduye mu kibuga hagati ku ruhande rwa Rayon Sports, aho abakinnyi bayo babonana neza cyane.

16:05

34' Coup-franc y'Amagaju

Mutsinzi Ange akiniye nabi Uko Emmanuel inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, ikosa rihanwe na Ndikumana Tresor umupira uca hejuru y'izamu rya Rayon Sports.

16:01

31' Ikarita y'umuhondo

Kapiteni w'Amagaju FC, Ndikumana Tresor ahawe ikarita y'umuhondo nyuma yo gukinira nabi Rapgael Da Silva mu kibuga hagati.

16:00

29' Amagaju FC agerageje uburyo bugana mu izamu

Ku mupira ahawe na Ndikumana Bodo, Dusabe Jean Claude acenze Iradukunda Eric, atera umupira muremure mu izamu ufatwa na Mazimpaka Andre.

15:56

26' Gusimbuza kwa Rayon Sports

Umukinnyi wo hagati wa Rayon Sports, Niyonzima Olivier 'Sefu avuye mu kibuga nyuma yo kongera kubabara. Umunya-Ghana Donkor Prosper yinjiye mu kibuga mu mwanya we.

15:50

18' Umukino uhagazeho gato

Niyonzima Olivier Sefu atewe umupira na Uko Ndubuise Emmanuel, agwa hasi. Umusifuzi ahise ahamagara abaganga ngo bamwiteho.

15:45

14' Igitego cya Rayon Sports

Umunya-Brazil Raphael Da Silva atsinze igitego cye cya mbere muri Azam Rwanda Premier League yagezemo mu Ukuboza umwaka ushize, aho acitse ba myugariro b'Amagaju ari kumwe na Djabel, asigarana n'umunyezamu ubundi ashyira umupira mu rushundura.

15:44

12' Amagaju ahushije igitego

Irambona Fabrice ateye ishoti rikomeye umunyezamu Mazimpaka Andre ashyira umupira muri koruneri

15:41

9' Umunyezamu Pacifique arokoye Amagaju

Umusifuzi Jano avuze ko Irambona Fabrice yakoze umupira inyuma gato y'urubuga rw'amahina, umupira utewe na Djabel ukurwamo na Paccy, bawushyira muri koruneri na yo itewe ariko Mutsinzi Ange awushyira hanze.

15:37

5' Coup-franc ya Rayon Sports

Mutsinzi Ange ateye umupira w'umuterekano inyuma y'urubuga rw'amahina rw'Amagaju FC, uca hejuru y'izamu.Raphael Jonathan na we abonye uburyo bugana ku izamu, akurwaho umupira na Tuyishime Emmanuel

15:35

3' Rayon Sports ibonye koruneri

Rayon Sports ibonye koruneri ya mbere mu mukino, iterwa na Manishimwe Djabel umupira ushyirwaho umutwe na Habimana Hussein uca ku ruhande rw'izamu.

15:33

2' Gusatira kwa Rayon Sports

Irambona Eric arenguye umupira mu izamu, Abakinnyi b'Amagaju FC birwanaho. Ulimwengu agerageje irindi shoti rigana mu izamu, Twagirimana Pacifique afata umupira neza.

15:30

Umukino uratangiye

Umusifuzi Nkunzimana Jean Marie Vianney atangije umukino. Umupira wa mbere utewe na Raphael Da Silva akinana na Djabel, Amagaju bawutera mu rubuga rwa Rayon Sports.

15:19

Abakinnyi babanjemo ku mpande zombi

Amagaju FC:Twagirimana Pacifique, Ndikumana Tresor, Biraboneye Aphrodice, Dusabe Jean Claude, Rutayisire Egide, Usengimana Jean Pierre, Mugisha Josue, Irambona Fabrice, Ndikumana Bodo, Uko Ndubuise Emmanuel, Tuyishime Emmanuel.

Umutoza: Hategekimana Jano Abdallah



Rayon Sports: Mazimpaka Andre, Manzi Thierry, Iradukunda Eric, Irambona Eric, Niyonzima Olivier, Mutsinzi Ange, Ulimwengu Jules, Habimana Hussein, Mugheni Kakule, Manishimwe Djabel na Raphael Jonathan Da Silva.

Umutoza: Roberto Oliveira

15:12

Icyo umukino uvuze ku makipe yombi

Amagaju FC arasabwa gutsinda uyu mukino ndetse n'iyindi yose asigaranye kugira ngo yizere kuguma mu cyiciro cya mbere. Rayon Sports irasabwa gutsinda kugira ngo yongere gusubira ku mwanya wa mbere dore ko ubu irushwa amanota abiri na APR FC ya mbere na 62, yo yatsinze Gicumbi FC ibitego 3-1 ku wa Kane.

15:10

Ikaze kuri Stade ya Nyagisenyi

Tubahaye ikaze kuri Stade y'akarere ka Nyamagabe iri i Nyagisenyi. Hagiye kubera umukino w'umunsi wa 27 wa shampiyona hagati y'Amagaju FC na Rayon Sports.

Amagaju FC aheruka kunganyiriza i Nyagatare na Sunrise FC igitego 1-1 mu gihe Rayon Sports yatsinze Police FC igitego 1-0.
